answerText: The Age of Innocence[10] The Age of Innocence was written by this author of The Fruit of the Tree and Ethan Frome.
heading: ACF Fall |2008 | Brown | 13 | Literature | American | College
subject: Literature
question: Question: At the end of this work, the main character receives an invitation from his son Dallas to go to Paris, but declines to visit the apartment of Ellen Olenska. For 10 points each: [10] Identify this novel whose other main characters include May Welland and Newland Archer.
